hero.title: The Most Advanced Browser Fingerprint Protection Solution
hero.subtitle: Manage unlimited browser profiles with unique fingerprints to automate your workflow and avoid detection issues.

featuresSection.sectionSubtitle: All the tools you need to manage your browser profiles with maximum privacy and efficiency

antiDetection.title: Anti-Detection Browser
antiDetection.description: Create and manage multiple browser profiles with unique fingerprints to avoid detection.

teamCollaboration.title: Team Collaboration
teamCollaboration.description: Securely share browser profiles with your team and manage access permissions.

automation.title: Browser Automation
automation.description: Automate repetitive tasks with our powerful automation tools and API.

proxyIntegration.title: Proxy Integration
proxyIntegration.description: Easily integrate with your existing proxies or purchase proxies directly through our platform.

mobileSimulation.title: Mobile Device Simulation
mobileSimulation.description: Simulate mobile devices with accurate fingerprints for mobile testing and automation.

cookies.title: Cookies & Local Storage
cookies.description: Securely store and manage cookies and local storage data across multiple profiles.

testimonials.sectionSubtitle: Thousands of professionals and companies trust AdsPower to protect their online identity

testimonial1.text: AdsPower has completely transformed how we manage our marketing campaigns. The anti-detect browser has saved us countless hours and increased our conversion rates by 40%.
testimonial1.name: Sarah Johnson

testimonial2.text: As an e-commerce business owner, I need reliable tools to manage multiple accounts. AdsPower is the most robust solution I've found, with excellent customer support.
testimonial2.name: Michael Chen

testimonial3.text: The team collaboration features have been a game-changer for our agency. We can easily share profiles and securely manage client accounts without any hassle.
testimonial3.name: Jessica Rodriguez

pricingSection.sectionSubtitle: Choose the plan that meets your needs. All plans come with a 14-day free trial.
